subject: upgrading from apache to apache2 under debian
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hi all.

I'm still running the apache package under debian here, and was
wondering if the upgrade to apache2 is worth it? Also, how smooth is
it or isn't it to carry over the config files from apache to apache2?
Thanks.

Greg
